name: DEUS EX MACHINA (new)
description:
September 9, 2099 Find out the secret base of the mad scientist who threatens the world, and crush his crazy plans.

Deus Ex Machina aka DEM is a series of VR room escape style Robot action adventure games.
With a cool & rich story, and passionate characters
Based on the near future of 2099,
The Special investigation agency Dem's activities can be experienced in VR world.

Information

0. No horror !!!! (developers don't like horror)
1, Includes action minigames
2. Full-voice supported

* Part 1 is the story of DEM Team 1
* DEM Team 2 - 4 Story Coming Soon...
